Package com.example.eventlink_qr_pro

Class EventDetailActivityTest

java.lang.Object
com.example.eventlink_qr_pro.EventDetailActivityTest
public class EventDetailActivityTest extends Object
Tests for EventDetailActivity using Espresso and Espresso Intents to verify UI components and navigation intents. These tests ensure that event details are correctly displayed and that buttons navigate to the correct activities.

Utilizes IntentsTestRule to initialize and release Espresso Intents before and after each test, facilitating intent verification.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    androidx.test.espresso.intent.rule.IntentsTestRule<EventDetailActivity>
    mActivityRule
    Rule to launch EventDetailActivity with a specific intent, allowing tests to verify the activity's behavior when populated with event details.

    Verifies correct navigation to the map screen for event check-ins when the respective button is clicked.

    Verifies that the event name is correctly displayed in the UI, based on the data provided through the activity's intent.
    void
    testNavigateToEditEventDetails()
    Verifies that the button for viewing and editing event details correctly navigates to the ViewEditEventDetailsActivity.
    void
    testSendNotificationButtonNavigatesCorrectly()
    Ensures that clicking the send notification button correctly navigates to the SendNotificationActivity.
    void

    Tests the share QR code button, ensuring it navigates to the ShareQRCodeActivity as expected.
